name: Guac
headline: AI-powered demand forecasting for grocery
description: Guac accurately forecasts demand for grocery retailers, to reduce food waste and increase availability.

founders.name: Euro Wang, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of Guac. Passionate about tackling food insecurity & waste with technology!

founders.name: Jack Solomon, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO of Guac. ML engineer working to make grocery retail more efficient.

# AI-powered demand forecasting & replenishment for fresh grocery
Less food waste. More availability. Designed specifically for fresh.
[Request a demo](https://www.guac-ai.com/</contact-us>) [How it works](https://www.guac-ai.com/</solutions>)
![Fresh purple grapes symbolizing grocery stores' inventory managed with AI forecasting solutions.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66fd64c9542662ea892098f3_Item%20row.avif)![green icons on a light blue background](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66fd64da8fd0cb1b5acca01c_Variables.avif)![A digital dashboard showing AI-powered demand forecasting for grocery stores.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66fd64d0b92e6f45e0b18d63_Graph.avif)
# AI-powered demand forecasting & replenishment for fresh grocery
Less food waste. More availability. Designed specifically for fresh.
[Request a demo](https://www.guac-ai.com/</contact-us>) [How it works](https://www.guac-ai.com/</solutions>)
Best-in-class fresh platform
## A total suite of fresh-first solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/67b31a22992beaf7b3fc2ffb_Frame%202609378.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/67b31ddf7bafcff0e5c04def_bestinclass%20mobile.png)
Industry-leading forecasting
## AI-powered forecasts for each SKU, each day, at each store
Built specifically for fresh, our proprietary algorithm leverages the newest research in AI to forecast your future demand.
[ How it works Arrow Right ](https://www.guac-ai.com/</forecasting>)
![Infographic highlighting how Guac AI reduces food waste in grocery stores.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66e470d7ed3cb3e41ba7e6f0_Home_Forecasts.avif)
Proven results
## More on-shelf availability, less food waste
When you know exactly how much you’ll sell in the future, you don’t need to over-stock or under-stock.
![Close-up of fresh vegetables and fruits, symbolizing grocery store inventory management with Guac AI.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66fb1e7a62a3cb5e8db4f519_Homepage_Stats_Fresh%20food.avif)
38%
Reduction in food waste
2%
Increase in availability
Why our forecasts win
## Your demand fluctuates based on what’s happening in the real world
We use hundreds of local data points tailored to your stores to forecast your demand: weather, sports, high school proms, demographics, and even social media trends.
[ Learn more about our forecasting Arrow Right ](https://www.guac-ai.com/</forecasting>)
![Happy grocery shoppers benefiting from optimized product availability using Guac AI.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66ede3f20125a3b9999ca4b6_Homepage__Forecasts%20Ipad.avif)
![Variables static](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66fef821c0cf000d3112d197_Variables%20static.avif)
## Our products
## For store teams
![Ordering from your phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/679d1e3fc5f0b86d5ed60a77_Ordering%20Gifs_.gif)
## Fresh ordering & inventory
Write perfect orders that reduce shrink and improve availability.
[ Learn more Arrow Right ](https://www.guac-ai.com/</ordering>)
![Production planning](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/672e84121abc89f9777911cc_Homepage_Production-Planning_Gif.gif)
## Production planning
Know exactly how much to produce for your prepared food items.
[ Learn more Arrow Right ](https://www.guac-ai.com/</production-planning>)
## For corporate teams
![AI-powered demand forecasting dashboard displayed on a monitor, optimizing grocery store inventory.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d5b8ea4fb61574497d60ff/66f0c47bfe1f97f47b64d109_Homepage_Dashboard_Gif.gif)
## Head office dashboard
Monitor and manage your stores’ fresh operations.
[ Learn more Arrow Right ](https://www.guac-ai.com/</dashboard>)

generated_description:
### Guac: The AI-Powered Grocery Game Changer

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** New York  
**Team Size:** 5 employees  
**Incubator:** Y Combinator Batch S23  
**Website:** [guac-ai.com](https://www.guac-ai.com)  

Guac is stepping into the grocery scene with a mission that’s as clear as it is compelling: to leverage AI for better demand forecasting. With food waste being a significant issue in grocery retail, Guac’s solutions target this problem head-on by accurately predicting what grocery retailers need—ultimately making more food available to consumers and less ending up in landfills.

#### The Problem and Solution

At its core, Guac addresses two major pain points in grocery retail:
1. **Reducing Food Waste:** About 38% reduction in food spoilage through accurate forecasting.
2. **Increasing Availability:** Aiming for a 2% boost in product availability by preventing over-ordering or under-stocking.

Using advanced machine-learning algorithms, Guac analyzes a multitude of factors—everything from local weather to economic trends and social media influences—to tailor demand forecasts for each Specific Key Unit (SKU) in each store. This is not just about numbers; it's about understanding real-world factors that impact what consumers buy.

#### Product Suite

Guac offers several key products designed for grocery retailers:

- **Fresh Ordering:** Simplifies the ordering process to ensure optimal stock levels.
- **Production Planning:** Helps determine the right amount of prepared food to produce, minimizing waste.
- **Head Office Dashboard:** A centralized system for corporate teams to monitor and manage fresh operations across multiple locations.

This suite not only enables better inventory management but also enhances the overall shopping experience for consumers.

#### Why It Matters

In a world where consumer preferences shift rapidly, coupled with the complexities of supply chains, Guac's AI-driven approach represents a substantial leap for the grocery industry. It’s not just about numbers—it's about making food systems more efficient and sustainable in an era where both waste reduction and food availability are critical.

The grocery landscape is changing, and Guac is positioning itself as a frontline innovator ready to transform how retailers think about their supply chain. With a dedicated team and the backing of Y Combinator, Guac is on track to reshape the future of how groceries are stocked, sold, and managed, fostering a healthier planet and better consumer experience.

If you’re in the grocery business and you’re still ordering the old way, it might be time to take a look at what Guac has to offer. Their fresh solutions could be just what you need to thrive in a demanding market. 

For more information or to see what Guac can do for your grocery store, visit their [website](https://www.guac-ai.com) and consider requesting a demo. It's your chance to embrace the future of grocery!
